content:
That's great to hear! Taking a stand-up comedy class can be a fantastic way to learn the craft, get feedback, and improve your skills. Six weeks is a good amount of time to start seeing progress and refining your material.

How's the class been going? What have you learned so far? Have you had any particularly helpful feedback or insights from your instructor or fellow students?

Also, how's your writing process been going? Are you finding it easier to come up with new jokes and ideas, or is it still a struggle? Do you have any specific topics or themes you're focusing on in your material?

Remember, the more you write and practice, the better you'll get. Don't be afraid to try out new material and take risks on stage. And most importantly, have fun with it!
